email.title: '24/25 Sponsor Survey
email.text:
Hi everyone,
The DoCSoc committee hope you're all having a great time on your holidays and/or internships! We're currently recruiting sponsors for next year and would really value student input. If you have a spare 2-3 minutes, we'd love it if you could fill out our '24/25 sponsor survey: https://forms.office.com/e/H8brbFPq3i
See you all next year!
Aidan (he/him) - DoCSoc Secretary '24/25
